title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-7.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-7.1 - Application

State Regulations

This Subpart shall apply to all sleeping bags
manufactured or sold in New York State on or after March 1, 1979. Exception: Existing inventories of sleeping bags on March 1, 1979, may not be wholesaled after March 31, 1979, nor retailed after July 15, 1979. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
